go_data.justification: T3 activates pro-survival pathways including Akt and mTOR.

go_data.term: regulation of cardiac muscle cell growth
go_data.justification: Treatment with T3 after myocardial infarction is cardioprotective and promotes elements of physiological hypertrophic response after cardiac injury.
mTOR is activated by T3, which also activates pro-survival pathways including Akt.
T3 activates many of the physiological changes that would benefit the heart, activating pro-survival pathways Akt and mTOR.
